title: Guardians of the wild
brief_description: Every day, fifty different species of animals disappear from this planet. However, there is hope, as a group of people around the world dedicate their lives to saving the endangered inhabitants of the planet. The animals featured include elephants, cheetahs, the rhinoceros and the wildlife of the Channel Islands.
